name: Maze of Reaction
description:
Made as a part of the Kiwi Game Jam 2019.

Theme: Chain Reaction

Made by: Jamcamnz

What happens if you are stuck in an ever expanding maze? This game allows you to answer this question. Collect the wrong rune, and the maze will expand, while the correct rune will shrink the maze. If the maze gets to big, it will be impossible to get out of.
